definition: Ulaanbaatar or Ulan Bator, capital of Mongolia
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
crow/black
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)

sentences.english: A truth-sharing video seminar held in Ulaanbaatar.
sentences.chinese: 在烏蘭巴托舉辦電視弘法講座。

sentences.english: "We may not be able to raise our animals in UB, " he went on.
sentences.chinese: 在烏蘭巴托，我們也許不能再養牲口了。

sentences.english: The prevalence of non-prescribed antibiotic use for young children was high in Ulaanbaatar.
sentences.chinese: 烏蘭巴托幼兒使用非處方抗生素十分普遍。

sentences.english: Alcoholism is rampant among UB's poor and unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒問題在烏蘭巴托的窮困和失業人口中猖獗氾濫。

sentences.english: The government square of Mongolia's capital Ulaanbaatar.
sentences.chinese: 外蒙首都烏蘭巴托的國家廣場。

sentences.english: The journey from Irkutsk to Ulan Bator got off to an alarming start.
sentences.chinese: 從伊爾庫茨克到烏蘭巴托的旅程有個嚇人的開端。

sentences.english: An aerial view of Ulan Bator's Sukhbaatar Square shows the Mongolian Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 烏蘭巴托蘇赫巴託廣場的鳥瞰圖，展示了蒙古國會。

definition: Yekaterinburg (Russian city, also known as Ekaterinburg or Sverdlovsk)

Lumbini, Nepal, birthplace of Siddhartha Gautama 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2] founder of Buddhism (also written 嵐毘尼|岚毗尼[Lan2 pi2 ni2], 臘伐尼|腊伐尼[La4 fa2 ni2], 林微尼[Lin2 wei1 ni2])
(Tw) Georgia, US state/Georgia (country)
Nairobi, capital of Kenya
Lake Baikal
Qaramay shehiri (Karamay city) or Kèlāmǎyī prefecture-level city in Xinjiang
Qinghai-Tibet railway
Phoenix, capital of Arizona/also 菲尼克斯[Fei1 ni2 ke4 si1]
